name: Arrow Ninja
description:
A basic 3D sidescroller where the player is tasked to get to the end of the level by completing a mix of shooting and jumping.

This game was originally based to be a ninja wall runner game where the player would jump along arrows to get to the end, but I ended up pivoting to a neon like style for simplicity so I could focus on the development of game mechanics.

If you are interested in the development of the project check out my project management trello board.

Trello - https://trello.com/b/A2lV8jGd/arrowninja-aint254
